name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving a PowerShell script executed via phishing, leading to data exfiltration.

action--d5b1edc7-7fb6-4c8e-9efe-da77ba65.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--d5b1edc7-7fb6-4c8e-9efe-da77ba65.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing the malicious script.

action--bc6d4e12-5453-4674-9d8e-4c0b55f6.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--bc6d4e12-5453-4674-9d8e-4c0b55f6.description: Isolate host-22 to prevent further exfiltration of data.

action--ff14f7e5-8f5c-403c-b5d2-b548f663.name: Run malware scan on affected hosts
action--ff14f7e5-8f5c-403c-b5d2-b548f663.description: Perform repeated malware scans on affected hosts until clean.

loop--scan-until-clean.name: Perform Malware Scan Loop
loop--scan-until-clean.description: Repeat scanning until the scan result is clean.

action--b2cb56ef-60a1-4750-981f-75b894d1.name: Review log files for suspicious activity
action--b2cb56ef-60a1-4750-981f-75b894d1.description: Analyze auth log files for any suspicious actions.

action--ed7b65ff-b3c8-4b64-b11c-242f40fb.name: Notify security team of the incident
action--ed7b65ff-b3c8-4b64-b11c-242f40fb.description: Send an alert to the security team about the ongoing incident.
